item.title: Music Videos
item.description:
I listed to a mix of music and Youtube is quickly becoming a favorite platform to watch performances.

My mix This mix has a lot of Metallica, and Robert Earl Keen.

Some of my favorite county music videos.

Genre Artist Song Link
Country Robert Earl Keen Merry Christmas from the family https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P37xPiRz1sg
Country Old Crow Medicine Show Wagon Whell https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1gX1EP6mG-E
Country Johnny Cash Hurt https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8AHCfZTRGiI

item.title: Vimwiki & Taskwarrior
item.description:
I have recently been obsessed with Vimwiki and Taskwarrior. I may be 4 years behind the VImWiki wave. It has taken me more than a few blog posts and YouTube Videos set to get mine set up.

Vim Wiki Blog Posts

VIM Tutorial

This is an amazing VIM Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3G6kAEvbv2A&t=5505s

General

https://mkaz.blog/working-with-vim/vimwiki

Plugins

https://github.com/mattn/calendar-vim

YouTube Videos

This one got me started and hooked on the idea.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A1YgbAp5YRc&t=539s

Taskwarrior

Taskwarrior lets you manager your tasks from the command line

https://taskwarrior.org/

On the command line type task report and you can get the commands for all the different type of reports.

https://taskwarrior.org/docs/report/

A helpful video: Approachable on getting started and features.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tijnc65soEI&t=2500s

Blog Post on setting up Taskwarrior and Timewarrior ( this may be helpful for those on Macs)

https://jessachandler.com/posts/setup-task-and-time-warrior/

Timewarrior

The time warrior main page is here.

https://timewarrior.net/

To connect Taskwarrior and Timewarrior check out this page. I am not jazzed that timewarrior does not just take the explicit tag from taskwarrior instead will grab both the tage and the descrption of the tag.

https://timewarrior.net/docs/taskwarrior/

item.title: OJS
item.description:
Using Observable Tutorial
https://quarto.org/docs/computations/ojs.html

  • OJS is geared towards charts (data viz) and not so much tables.

  • I strongly dislike my tables in my Dashboard. This may help: Link to table options in OJS.

  • Render the website use ~

    quarto render
